name: Fallen Saint Yhoundeh
storyline: In her quest to liberate the Kingdom of Nyarlaza, Elk-Saintess Yhoundeh, aided by Naia and her brother, Charles, faces the daunting task of overthrowing the tyrannical rule of King Sadogui and his legion of followers. Scattered across the world, Sadogui's Four Generals pose formidable challenges, prompting Yhoundeh to embark on a perilous adventure while confronting a myriad of magical adversaries along the way. On her journey, she encounters local villagers whose actions both hinder and aid her progress, gradually expanding the ensemble of characters and complicating her mission further. Can she fulfill her sacred duty as the Elk-Saintess and deliver the kingdom from its oppressive regime?
summary: One day, Yhoundeh suddenly finds herself summoned to a mysterious temple, where she learns that she is the 'Elk-Saintess' of prophecy who must save the Kingdom of Nyarlaza from the tyrannical rule King Sadogui.
